CommentUK: Before the Seven Years’ War, maritime hostility with France (« Rafle de Boscawen »).
CommentFR: Before the Seven Years’ War, maritime hostility with Britain (« Rafle de Boscawen »).

CommentNL: Around this time, many Dutch ships were seized by British privateers/war ships. Even though the British were allies, the captures were supposedly for carrying contraband.
